text: aur jab moosa apanee jaati kee or krodh tatha duhkh se bhara hua vaapas aaya, to usane kahaah tumane mere pashchaat mera bahut bura pratinidhitv kiya. kya tum apane paalanahaar kee aagya se pahale hee jaldee kar[1] gaye? tatha usane lekh takhtiyaan daal deen tatha apane bhaee (haaroon) ka sir pakad ke apanee or kheenchane laga. usane kahaah he mere maan jaaye bhaee! logon ne mujhe nirbal samajh liya tatha sameep tha ki ve mujhe maar daalen. atah too shatruon ko mujhapar hansane ka avasar na de. mujhe atyaachaariyon ka saathee na bana
